oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Hugh Miller Oral History Interview, 2011 March 11
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Hugh Miller, conducted on March 11, 2011 by Bradley Aders as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Hugh Miller, resident manager of the River Plantation condo complex in Bellevue, describes the flooding of River Plantation, the threats for elderly people in one story condos, and his own rescue.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Miller, Hugh, 1960- --Interviews
